Server.Name: CrazyWastelands
Server.Description:
Server : 78.46.32.171:26900 WebSite: www.crazy-wastelands.de This mod was orginally created to modify some of the new Changes from the Pimps. It brings back Wood Planks and Sticks, Trunk Pines and different Meat Types.
Also it adds the more Weapons like Spear, Katana and Swords. Some new Blocks added , like a working Jukebox, New Workbench for Vehicle Crafting some new Cooking Workbenches.
Progression was changed too primary some Recipe Unlocks changed and modified values for some of the different Boni you get from the Skills.
Biome changes include a deeper World until you reach Bedrock, Modified Ore Spawns in the different Biomes, Apple and Cherry Trees and some Recipes to use this new Food.
Added back all different Meat Types for the Animals and added new Recipes for Food.
Added some Named Unique Weapons not in Loot table but can be used as Boss Loot or for Events , this Unique Weapons offer better Stats and/or already have some Features from Weapons Mods integreatet into the Weapon itself.
Modified Vehicle Speed and Fuel Usage.
And more is Planned .
